title: The Future of Frontend: AI-Powered Development & Fullstack Evolution
description: How AI is reshaping frontend development, the growing importance of fullstack capabilities, and why modern developers need to embrace both paradigms.

title: Model Context Protocol (MCP) & UI Trends: The Future of AI Integration
description: Exploring how Model Context Protocol is revolutionizing AI integration in modern UIs, with practical patterns for building context-aware interfaces.

title: Angular Evolution: From AngularJS to Angular 20
description: A comprehensive guide to migrating legacy AngularJS applications through Angular 2-20, covering breaking changes, migration strategies, and modern patterns.

title: Building Scalable Micro-frontends with Module Federation
description: A deep dive into implementing micro-frontend architecture using Webpack Module Federation for enterprise applications.

title: SSR vs SSG: Choosing the Right Next.js Rendering Strategy
description: Understanding when to use Server-Side Rendering, Static Site Generation, and ISR for optimal performance and SEO.

title: Design Systems: From Zero to Production
description: Best practices for building and maintaining a comprehensive design system that scales across multiple teams and products.

title: Real-time Data Visualization with React and WebSockets
description: Implementing efficient real-time data updates and complex visualizations for dashboards handling thousands of concurrent users.

title: Optimizing React Performance: Beyond React.memo
description: Advanced techniques for improving React application performance including virtualization, code splitting, and lazy loading.

title: TypeScript Advanced Patterns for React Developers
description: Mastering advanced TypeScript patterns including generics, conditional types, and utility types for type-safe React applications.

title: Building Accessible Web Applications with ARIA
description: A comprehensive guide to implementing WCAG 2.1 standards and ARIA attributes for creating inclusive web experiences.

title: State Management in 2026: Redux vs Zustand vs Context API
description: Comparing modern state management solutions and choosing the right tool for your React application's needs.

title: Testing Strategies for Modern React Applications
description: End-to-end testing with Playwright, unit testing with Jest, and integration testing strategies for robust applications.

title: CSS-in-JS vs Tailwind CSS: A Practical Comparison
description: Evaluating different styling approaches in modern React applications, performance implications, and developer experience.
